channel.description: Well as the Title says im using Delta and i want to make some items ONLY wearble for like PlayerRights 2 or Donator only any1 can help me? im sorry if my english sux

item.title: [Delta] Wear Rights? <--IDK how i should call this [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Ferity Ferity
item.description:
@Ferity wrote:

In client.java search for public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {
Then add:

if((wearID == ****) && (donator == 1)) { sM("You must be a donator to wear this item."); return false; }
If you want a mod + item, change donator == 1 to playerRights == 0.
If you want an item that’s ONLY available for player rights, then change donator == 1 to playerRights != 2.

Read full topic
